title: Exercise: Use the Geometry Published Parameter

questions.question: Which transformer is useful for turning your Geometry published parameter into useable features with geometry?
Why did this workspace include a Bufferer?
options: You are assuming the end-user will choose the incorrect area on the map.
You are trying to find water mains that might be affected by the construction.
The noise from construction can affect residents living up to 100 meters away from the construction site.
The Geometry published parameter will only work in conjunction with a Bufferer.

questions.question: When using the Geometry published parameter in FME Server, the end-user picks their area of interest using an interactive web map.
